name: Kimodameshi School VR
description:
Kimodameshi is a Japanese test of courage. A small game. You have to reach the roof by going through several puzzles. 

Was made for Cardboard , so it has 3-dof  sitting position and original controls:
- Use the stick to turn left and right. Use the stick to turn left and right.
- Other buttons perform almost all functions, from menu activation to walking.
